A

Analysis - Class in org.quark.stegnos
Simple class to hold the results of an analysis.
analyze(PImage, PImage) - Static method in class org.quark.stegnos.Steganos
Analyze a possible image-image combination and confirm that it is a usable combination.
analyze(PImage, String) - Static method in class org.quark.stegnos.Steganos
Analyze a possible image-text combination and confirm that it is a usable combination.
approved - Variable in class org.quark.stegnos.Analysis
 
approved() - Method in class org.quark.stegnos.Analysis
Returns true if the analysis shows the combination is suitable for a stegan.

B

BitBuffer - Class in org.quark.stegnos
This class encapsulates an integer array and enables the data to be read one or more bits at a time.
BitBuffer(int[], int, int) - Constructor for class org.quark.stegnos.BitBuffer
Use this for reading the CARRIER data
A BitBuffer created using this constructor is suitable for reading encrypted burden data from the carrier.
BitBuffer(int[], int, int[], int) - Constructor for class org.quark.stegnos.BitBuffer
Use this for reading the BURDEN data
A BitBuffer created using this constructor is suitable for reading encrypted burden data when embedding into a steganograph.

D

decodeImage(String, PImage, int) - Static method in class org.quark.stegnos.Encryption
Decode the image.

E

embedImage(String, PImage, PImage) - Static method in class org.quark.stegnos.Steganos
Merge the burden image into the carrier image to create a stegan.
embedText(String, PImage, String) - Static method in class org.quark.stegnos.Steganos
Create a merge the text into the carrier image to make a stegan.
encodeImage(String, PImage, int) - Static method in class org.quark.stegnos.Encryption
Encode the image.
Encryption - Class in org.quark.stegnos
This class provides a number of methods used internally by the library to encrypt / decrypt images and text.
Encryption() - Constructor for class org.quark.stegnos.Encryption
 
extractImage(String, PImage) - Static method in class org.quark.stegnos.Steganos
Extract the image from the stegan.
extractText(String, PImage) - Static method in class org.quark.stegnos.Steganos
Extract the text from the stegan.

G

getBurdenType(PImage) - Static method in class org.quark.stegnos.Steganos
Assuming that the image is in fact a stegan get the type of burden embedded.
getNext() - Method in class org.quark.stegnos.BitBuffer
Get the next bit
getNext(int) - Method in class org.quark.stegnos.BitBuffer
Get a number of bits and pass back as LSB in an integer.
getVersion(PImage) - Static method in class org.quark.stegnos.Steganos
Given a stegan get the version number used to create it.

I

isEmpty() - Method in class org.quark.stegnos.BitBuffer

N

nbrBitsSet(int) - Method in class org.quark.stegnos.BitBuffer

S

Steganos - Class in org.quark.stegnos
This class provides the main user API for this library and provides methods to
In this documentation I use the term 'stegan' to represent any image with a hidden burden.
